moderation-log-change: "change $1", where $1 is the link to not-yet-approved change.
moderation-log-diff: "edit $1", where $1 is the link to the diff (already approved change).
right-moderation-checkuser:
{{doc-right|moderation-checkuser}}
Allows to see IPs of registered users on Special:Moderation.
right-skip-moderation:
{{doc-right|skip-moderation}}
Allows to bypass moderation when saving an edit.
right-skip-move-moderation:
{{doc-right|skip-move-moderation}}
Allows to bypass moderation when renaming a page.
